name: Red Rover (itch)
description:
Play as a rover on the planet Mars, collecting pieces of a broken antenna which were destroyed in a sandstorm. Collect the broken pieces to assemble and communicate with Mission Control in Cape Canaveral.

*This game was originally created at Indie Galactic Space Jam 2019 in the span of 48 hours.*

The Team

Anthony Todd - Programmer

Chad Hoover - Voice Actor

Deana Galbraith - Designer 

Jose Beltran - Artist

Kathleen Allewelt - Artist

Michael Hanusiak - Audio

Neesarg Banglawala - Programmer

Shelby Van Zandt - Artist
